EmailTemplate.textOnly: - - - Clean Clean false false false EN-US X-NONE X-NONE Dear Margo ,Thanks for contacting MBO Partners. As we discussed Judy will be the best contact for you regarding working with the federal government. Please see her contact information below:Judy Bradt | CEO, Summit Insight <http://www.summitinsight.com/> | Strategic Advisors for Government Contracts494 N Pickett St, Alexandria VA 22304 | 703.627.1074judy.bradt@summitinsight.com <mailto:judy.bradt@summitinsight.com> | Connect With Me On LinkedIn <http://www.linkedin.com/in/judybradt> | Follow Me On Twitter <http://twitter.com/judybradt> | Visit My Blog <http://www.sell2usgov.com/> | Find me On FaceBook <http://www.facebook.com/SummitInsight>Author of "Government Contracts Made Easier <http://www.governmentcontractsmadeeasier.com/>" -- now available! Best regards and good luck!Sara___________________________________SARA CONDEConsultant Services Advisor MBO Partners t: 703.793.6028f: 703.793.6068e: sconde@mbopartners.com <mailto:sconde@mbopartners.com>w: www.mbopartners.com <http://www.mbopartners.com/> Notice: This email and any files transmitted with it are confidential. They are intended solely for the use of the individual addressed. If you have received this email in error please notify postmaster@mbopartners.com <mailto:postmaster@mbopartners.com> and permanently delete the e-mail and files.
